Text:
Jesus! Ive only been waiting for this album to come out since...2000? FFS! 

Thanx a million btw..appretiate your dedication to piracy =]
I'm liking what I hear so far.  I was doubting this album after hearing Tarantula but I'm really enjoying it so far.  Thanks!
Indeed. Corgan really did put his heart and soul into this one..again thanx
great quality. pretty good album, i dont think it stands up very tall to the other albums, but still good. a tad dissapointed
when someone gets it, release this with the "bonus tracks". there will be diff versions of the cd when its realised that have different songs
Being a 12 year pumpkins fan........... disappointed. Most of it is better than Tarantula. Billy Corgan really has to stop producing their albums. Thanks for sharing
This album sucks!! But ty anyway
Beeeye, Corgan didn't produce this album. It is produced by Terry Date and Roy Thomas Baker, who is known for producing Queen.
I'm missing song nr. 4. WinRAR gave an error when unrarring the CD.
Corgan's whining vocals, uninspiring music makes for a forgettable album.
